  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Player
    Class to Handle Character/Player Info And Details
    ssmHandler
    ssmHandler Class to Manage ssm sent and recieved data to organize Player info and Characters on Host And Client Screens Note that two SSMs are used for the network due to the massive amount of information being sent per frame - this is done to avoid any overriding of data or a slow connection
